title: BrightNight and Cordelio achieve financial close on Washington BESS
description: The lithium ion-based BESS will connect to the grid via a short tie line to the White River substation.
content:
Power and digital infrastructure company BrightNight, in partnership with Cordelio Power, has reached financial close on the Greenwater energy storage project in Pierce County, Washington, US.
